Module chav1961.purelib
Package chav1961.purelib.ui.interfaces

Interface ErrorProcessing<Common,​ErrorType extends java.lang.Enum<?>>

Type Parameters:
Common - data type for the information shared with all the WizardStep instances (usually some descriptor to fill with wizard)
ErrorType - type of the errors can be detected on the wizard execution stages
All Known Implementing Classes:
SimpleWizard
public interface ErrorProcessing<Common,​ErrorType extends java.lang.Enum<?>>

This interface describes error and warning processor

Since:
0.0.2
Author:
chav1961

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void processError​(Common content, ErrorType err, java.lang.Object... parameters)
    Process errors detected
    void processWarning​(Common content, ErrorType err, java.lang.Object... parameters)
    Process warnings detected

  • Method Details

    • processError

      void processError​(Common content, ErrorType err, java.lang.Object... parameters) throws FlowException, LocalizationException

      Process errors detected

      Parameters:
      content - data type for the information shared with all the WizardStep instances (usually some descriptor to fill with wizard)
      err - type of the errors can be detected on the wizard execution stages
      parameters - advanced parameters
      Throws:
      FlowException - usually need be thrown to indicate error
      LocalizationException - when any localization errors were detected

    • processWarning

      void processWarning​(Common content, ErrorType err, java.lang.Object... parameters) throws LocalizationException

      Process warnings detected

      Parameters:
      content - data type for the information shared with all the WizardStep instances (usually some descriptor to fill with wizard)
      err - type of the errors can be detected on the wizard execution stages
      parameters - advanced parameters
      Throws:
      LocalizationException - when any localization errors were detected
